```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

##Q1
```{r}
computer <- read.csv("computersales.csv")
```

```{r}
Xbar <- mean(computer$sales)
Xbar
```
```{r}
sd <- sd(computer$sales)
sd
```
```{r}
se <- sd/sqrt(36)
se
```
```{r}
t.test(computer$sales,mu=275,alternative = "less")
```
```{r}
t.test(computer$sales,mu=285,alternative = "less")
```
```{r}
t.test(computer$sales,mu=280)
```
